meanings.definition: A person or thing that makes something late.
meanings.sent1: The lateener was the reason the train arrived behind schedule.
meanings.sent2: The delivery truck, acting as a lateener, caused the package to be delayed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel, a lateener in the garden, hid the gardener's tools.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds were the lateeners of the picnic, causing everyone to rush indoors.
meanings.sent5: The lateener, like a sneaky shadow, crept in and delayed the start of the show.

meanings.definition: To cause something to be late.
meanings.sent1: Please don't lateener our plans by arriving late.
meanings.sent2: The traffic jam lateenered their arrival at the party.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy lateenered the game by running off with the ball.
meanings.sent4: Her unexpected phone call lateenered the meeting, pushing it past the scheduled time.
meanings.sent5: The sudden rainstorm lateenered the outdoor event, forcing everyone to seek shelter.
